channel.title: Port help please
channel.description: Ok. last thing for my server is the port. where can i find "network and internet connections?" I did this once but now i cant find.

item.title: Port help please
item.dc:creator: @SLITER.8 SLITER.8
item.description:
@SLITER.8 wrote:

[quote=“77ty4w, post:4, topic:163764”][quote author=SLITER.8 link=topic=222476.msg1923053#msg1923053 date=1197256125]

-.- go to Control panel>network and internet connections>windows firewall>exceptions>add port[/quote]

found it. i was in classic view. its not in classic view. next: post fowarding.

Please use the search button before you post.

thats not in my control panel…

How is it not in your control panel?[/quote]

Read full topic
